Charging Method: Ps3key Open vers firm manager 2.1 + 1.3, see info below

Load Note: Well as I knew the game was not as a matter of command refers to is not recognized them. Now has come a program that solves the crash.

Charging Method:
1. Remove the installation data and all data stored in the F1 2010.
2. Open Mod Install Manager (v 1.13) on the PS3 www.consolasatope.com visit there you have the program in the post of the game.)
3. Once installed on the PS3, you start the Open Manager. At the start it will tell you if you want to use the directory "LAUN12345" presionais "No". Then another message will indicate if you want to use the directory "OMAN46756" and presionais "Yes."
4. Done, copy the backup of F1 2010 in your computer to the PS3 with FTP, or from the bluray, the directory OMAN46756. " I spent first game files in a pendrive 8 gigabyte hard drive and then the PS3 with the same program, a marvel.
5. Open Start Manager, select the F1 2010, press R2 and check out "Patched Mode" and play.

Abstract:
Dive into the glamor, the frenzy and excitement of motor sport world's most exciting F1 2010 to be placed on the grid all drivers, teams and tracks the long-awaited official 2010 season F1 World Championship the FIA.
World Champions take on the FIA F1 Fernando Alonso, Michael Schumacher, Lewis Hamilton and Jenson Button in any of the circuits. F1 2010 is the return of the Canadian Grand Prix, the premiere high definition in the spectacular night race in Abu Dhabi and Singapore and the opportunity to tour the brand new circuit in South Korea even before the pilots. Thanks to the technological platform for Codemasters' EGO games, the world of Formula 1 comes to life with sublime images, a realistic control, the weather more varied and better market system damage in different game modes with rapid games, path training and online multiplayer.
Enter the heart of Formula 1 as ever with F1 2010.

Charging Method: Ps3key Open vers firm manager 2.1 + 1.3, see info below

Load Note: Well as I knew the game was not as a matter of command refers to is not recognized them. Now has come a program that solves the crash.

Charging Method:
1. Remove the installation data and all data stored in the F1 2010.
2. Open Mod Install Manager (v 1.13) on the PS3 www.consolasatope.com visit there you have the program in the post of the game.)
3. Once installed on the PS3, you start the Open Manager. At the start it will tell you if you want to use the directory "LAUN12345" presionais "No".
Then another message will indicate if you want to use the directory "OMAN46756" and presionais "Yes."
4. Done, copy the backup of F1 2010 in your computer to the PS3 with FTP, or from the bluray, the directory OMAN46756.
I spent first game files in a pendrive 8 gigabyte hard drive and then the PS3 with the same program, a marvel.
5. Open Start Manager, select the F1 2010, press R2 and check out "Patched Mode" and play.

@ChinMan
This torrent is being targeted by a malicious group who are sucking all your bandwidth and automatically DDOS your IP and PORT that you use for torrents.
This causes some clients like Transmission to upload excessive amount and crash every 2 minutes.

To combat this problem: 1). Make your torrent client use a CLOSED port, this will offer you a firewall defence. 2). I recommend using Deluge with BLOCKLIST enabled

For someone who has time and wants the best results, use uTorrent and set the peer count to around 20, this will allow you to MANUALLY block the offending IP's.
